page.title: 12LIFE STYLES A SCHOOL DAY
page.content: Our school is called Worcesters Junior School. We start school at 9.00am and finish at 3.45pm. Our ages are 7-11yrs. There are 177 children in our school. Some of the subjects we study are: maths.,English, geography, reading, art, physical education and games. We have 8 classrooms but only 7 classes of children. Classes 1 and 2 are first years, class 3 is for second years, classroom 4 has maths. equipment in it, class 5 is for second and third years, class 6 is for third years, class 7 is for third and fourth years and class 8 is for fourth years. We have a staff room and two offices. Our school is a good school. Its greatest asset is that we have a large playground and field. The worst thing about the school is that the classrooms are too small.
